Scorponok turns around at theyre words and starts clicking his claws "HE
MUST HAVE JUST THOUGHT I WAS DEAD" Scorponok yells, but not sure wether he
is trying to convince the new predacons or himself. " You have rescued me
and for that I am grateful, I would even fight at youre side for that, but
if you are against Megatron, that makes my choice dificult" then he looks
around and realizes for the first time the remains of another body on the
ground " Terrasaur" He gasped as he runs over to the body with which he had
been buried for so long " He still might be able to function"

OOC: How was my explanation? I guess I will try to be Terrasaur as well.
